bio: We have developed a User Interface and offer open-source scripts for easy deployment of the OP Stack, including Full/Archive Nodes, Subgraph Indexer API, ...
contributionDescription:
We have developed a User Interface for easy deployment of the OP Stack, including both Full and Archive Nodes, the Subgraph Indexer API, and more. 

Additionally, we offer open-source scripts to streamline the OP Stack deployment process. 

Beyond this, we actively contribute to fixing bugs in the core Optimism repository and collaborate with the roll-up team to deliver the best OP Stack deployment tool.

contributionLinks.description: An open source script to launch op-erigon easily using docker compose
An open source docker compose to launch any customized OP Stack chains
An ansible script to simplify OP Stack deployment process using roll-op
An open source TMKMS YubiHSM Installer Interactive Shell
Pull request to a devnet deployment bug in the core Optimism repository
Fix 'Namespace' object has no attribute 'explorer' in roll-op

impactDescription:
We have developed a User Interface and offer open-source scripts for easy deployment of the OP Stack including a script to launch op-erigon easily using docker compose, a docker compose script to launch any customized OP Stack chains, and an ansible script for roll-op to simplify the OP Stack deployment process published to Ansible Galaxy.

We have fixed a devnet deployment bug in the core Optimism repository.
We have collaborated with roll-op and fixed a critical bug in their repository.
displayName: Upnode Deploy | OP Stack Deployment UI
